nodes.text: Undrarian was a Krikthasi junieuw on the planet Baralou. The territory covered thousands of square kilometers and contained over 20 individual tribes. Undrarian was also the location of the Magl'Ikkan Temple. Osi Hass led the Undrarian territory during the Galactic Civil War, and was on friendly terms with the Alliance to Restore the Republic agent Fez Devvol, commander of Aqualis Base.
